description: Number of ways n can be written as a sum of a square of a Fibonacci number and a cube of a Fibonacci number; F(1) = F(2) = 1 are considered the same.
mathematica: f = Prepend[ Table[ Fibonacci[ i ], {i, 2, 25} ], 0 ]; g = Sort[ Flatten[ Table[ f[ [ i ] ]^2 + f[ [ j ] ]^3, {i, 1, 25}, {j, 1, 25} ] ] ]; Table[ Count[ g, n ], {n, 0, 91} ]
author: _Felice Russo_
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 28 2001
Further terms from Victoria A Sapko (vsapko(AT)canes.gsw.edu), Oct 02 2003 and _Rick L. Shepherd_, Jul 13 2004
